content: hook my doll has 5 or 6 row of hair make your swatch bigger if you want more hair single_crochet will make tighter curls than double_crochet knitting makes a nice curled yarn too 2 when finished with step one wet the square thoroughly wrap it in a towel and squeeze it dry set it aside for a few days and let it dry and set completely 3 when you are done with all the other parts of the doll and are ready to put on the hair unravel the swatch you had made without stretching it too much wrap it around something like a 3 book or your crochet hook case and cut the yarn into 6 inch lengths this will give the doll 3 inch long hair fold each strand in half and use a crochet hook to pull hair through the dolls head pulling the open end through the looped end and knot it off put hair around the head making it look like a natural hair pattern see pictures head row instruction stitches 1 *using skin tone* 6 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 2 *2
